Class MorphologyChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • MorphologyChecker

  • public class MorphologyChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    The MorphologyChecker object is used update lemma information of morphologically complex nouns, which (as a full word) are not recgonized as a person or sentiment expression. If a sub lemma of the word can be recgonized as a person or sentiment expression, it will replace the lemma information for the word coming from the PaZu file.
    Author:
    patrick carroll

    • Constructor Detail

      • MorphologyChecker

        public MorphologyChecker(java.lang.String morphPath,
                 de.tuebingen.uni.sfs.germanet.api.GermaNet gNet,
                 boolean personCheck,
                 SentimentLex lex)
        Creates a new instance of MorphologyChecker.
        Parameters:
        morphPath - is used to open the file containing morphological parses or Nouns
        germanetPath - is used to open up germaNet for performing a person check.
        personCheck - is a boolean variable set with the same value as the personCheck setting from the Config File.
        lex - the sentiment lexicon is provided so that lemmas can be checked to see if they are sentiment expressions.

    • Method Detail

      • readMorphologyfile

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> readMorphologyfile()
        This method is called from the constructor to read in the morphology file and convert it to and internal representation of a HashMap.
        Returns:
        morphMap morphologyMap a map with keys as nouns, and values as a list of morph parses.

      • isPerson

        public boolean isPerson(java.lang.String lemma)
        This method is similar to the person check method used in the classic Module, but it receives as input a lemma, rather than a word object.
        Parameters:
        lemma - : the lemma being checked against the GermaNet database to determine if it's a person
        Returns:
        value of true if the lemma is a Person, False for everything else.

      • isSentiment

        public boolean isSentiment(java.lang.String lemma)
        This method checks a lemma to determine if it is present in the sentiment lexicon.
        Parameters:
        lemma - the lemma is checked against the sentiment lexicon, to determine if it's there.
        Returns:
        boolean value: true if the lemma is a sentiment word in the lexicon, false otherwise.

      • checkMorphhology

        public void checkMorphhology(SentenceList list,
                    boolean checkPersonNow,
                    boolean checkSentimentNow)
        This method iterates through the nouns in the morphologyMap to determine if any sub-lemma can be identified as a sentiment or a person.
        Parameters:
        list - -- the checker is passed the sentneceList in order to update lemma information if a sub-lemma is identified as person or sentiment.
        checkPersonNow - this boolean flag tells the method to determine if sub-lemmas are persons
        checkSentimentNow - this boolean flag tells the method to determine if sub-lemmas are sentiments

      • replaceLemma

        public void replaceLemma(SentenceList list,
                java.lang.String replacementLemma,
                java.lang.String key)
        This method is used once a sub-lemma has been identified as a person or sentiment expression. It iterates through all words in all sentences and re-sets the lemma of any word which matches the key provided to it.
        Parameters:
        list - : the word list which is being updated with new lemma information
        replacementLemma - : the sub-lemma which was identified as either a person or sentiment
        key - : the original word which is getting it's lemma replaced
